title: EUROPE RESEARCH ROUNDUP-Adidas, Deutsche Bank , Heineken
text:
â€© Feb 23 (Reuters) - Securities analysts revised their ratings and price targets on several European companies, including Adidas, Deutsche Bank and Heineken on Tuesday.

HIGHLIGHTS

* Adidas AG : Credit Suisse raises to neutral from underperform

* Deutsche Bank AG : Barclays raises to equal weight from underweight

* Heineken NV : RBC cuts to underperform from sector perform

* Lonza Group AG : JP Morgan raises to overweight from neutral

* Wulff Yhtiot : Inderes cuts to reduce from increase; target price EUR 3.50

Following is a summary of research actions on European companies reported by Reuters on Tuesday. Stock entries are in alphabetical order.

* Adidas AG : Credit Suisse raises target price to EUR 295 from EUR 255

* Adidas AG : Credit Suisse raises to neutral from underperform
